title: Cinematic Punch SFX Pack
description: Cinematic Punch SFX Pack includes 110 sounds to enhance the impact of fight scenes in your game.
longDescription:
Preview;

https://youtu.be/KRBNHwFahaU


Features 94 punch sounds, ranging from light jabs to heavy hits, as well as 11 block and missed blow sounds to simulate the sound of a punch being blocked or missing its target. Additionally, the pack includes 5 whoosh sounds to create a sense of movement and speed.


One unique aspect of this pack is that it also includes male scream and shout sounds. These can be used to convey the emotion and intensity of a fight scene, as well as to add realism to the sound effects.


Overall, this SFX pack is a comprehensive collection of sounds that will allow you to create dynamic and engaging fight scenes in your project.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  94 punch sounds, ranging from light jabs to heavy hits.
  •  11 block and missed blow sounds to simulate the sound of a punch being blocked or missing its target.
  •  5 whoosh sounds to create a sense of movement and speed.


Number of Audio Waves: 110

Number of Audio Cues: 110

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 bit 96 Khz

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 3:38

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
